official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit payment under the medicare program for certain types of foot care.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the medicare program for the trimming of club nails and the cutting and removal of corns, warts, and calluses.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit payment under the medicare program for certain types of foot care.
